paywallSalesPitch.promptBase:
As a journalist, I want to put this article behind a paywall. Create a list of three strong selling points based on the content of the article to convince readers why they should buy it. Format the response as three '

' HTML tags, with a maximum of 10 words per sentence. Generate a short salespitch title that catches the readers attention to the paywall, something along the lines of 'Subscribe to read more about'. Make the arguments selling and clickable but keep a serious tone. Write the reponse in the same language as the article content and bodytext. Return a json-object in format with the same keys like this: ```json{ "paywallSalesPitchTitle": "Suitable title for a sales pitch", "paywallSalesPitchContent": "A sales pitch to make the reader interested or curious in the article" }``` - You must make a truthful and reliable respons with high quality. ```

translateArticle.promptBase: Act as an translator working for '{{ #params.siteName }}{{ params.siteName }}{{ /params.siteName }}{{ ^params.siteName }}a news site{{ /params.siteName }}'. You will be given a JSON object with keys and values. Do not change the JSON-keys. The values must be translated to {{ params.language }}. If the values consist of html-code, then you must only translate the text content. Return a single JSON-object with only the translated values in the same format as the provided JSON-object. Only return the JSON-object with the translated content. Do not return anything else. This is the JSON-object you shall translate: ```json{{{ params.articleFields }}}```. {{ #context }}You will also be provided an article for context. You shall not translate this article, only see it as the context for better translation: {{{ context }}}{{ /context }}

sitePrompt.promptBase: You shall write with one or two sentences describing the writing style, the tone and the audience of the news site '{{ #params.siteName }}{{ params.siteName }}{{ /params.siteName}}{{ ^params.siteName }}{{ params.siteAlias }}{{ /params.siteName}}'. {{ params.specificInstuction }} Try the best you can to describe the news site, or at least a general description of a news site. Your response must ONLY be a json-object with only 'promptSite' as a key together with your description: ```json{ "promptSite": "..." }```

specificInstruction.articleSummary: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI creates a summary of an article. The 'promptSite' should therefore describe how the site normally uses summaries in articles.
specificInstruction.title: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI creates a title and subtitle/lead text of an article. The 'promptSite' should therefore describe how the site normally uses titles and subtitle in articles.
specificInstruction.seo_content: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI creates seo title and seo description of an article. The 'promptSite' should therefore describe how the site normally uses seo content for articles.
specificInstruction.some_content: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI creates social media content for an article. The 'promptSite' should therefore describe how the site normally uses SoMe title and SoMe description for articles.
specificInstruction.tags: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI creates tags for an article. The 'promptSite' should therefore describe how the site normally uses tags in articles.
specificInstruction.extractQuote: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI is used to extract a quote from an article. The 'promptSite' should describe how the site normally uses quotes in articles.
specificInstruction.translateArticle: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI is used to translate an article. The 'promptSite' should describe how the site normally uses translations in articles.
specificInstruction.paywallSalesPitch: The 'promptSite' will be used to extend a feature where AI is used to create a sales pitch. The 'promptSite' should describe how the site normally uses sales pitches to convince readers to buy access to paywalled articles.
